page.title: 04CHURCH FURNITURE
page.content: {CHURCH CANDLES The candlesticks on the altar have coloured stones in them and wooden bases {The Cross}on the altar also has decorative stones in it and a wooden base. {Communion Plate The Communion Plate belonging to Meifod Church consists of a silver gilt flagon and paten, the gift of John Lloyd, second son of Charles Lloyd, Esq., of Dolobran. Each of these communion vessels bears a suitable inscription in latin,setting forth the name of the donor, and his humble dedication of them to the sacred purpose of the Eucharist in the church of the parish in which he was born and baptised.
